data.title: Name the Disney song in your head right now.... and sing it out loud!
data.meta_description:
From the Country Bear jamboree....

Everytime I meet a guy who gets me shook,
All I ever get from him's a dirty look.
It's the same way, everywhere I've...
data.text:
From the Country Bear jamboree....

Everytime I meet a guy who gets me shook,

All I ever get from him's a dirty look.

It's the same way, everywhere I've found.

All the guys that turn me on, turn me down.

All the guys that turn me on, turn me down.

Nothing works for me that I found.

It's the same way everywhere I see.

Nothing ever seems to work for me.

Nothing ever seems to work for me.

Doodle doodle do-do-do bum bump.

Um diddle diddle diddle um diddle ay

Um diddle diddle diddle um diddle ay

Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious!

Even though the sound of it

Is something quite atrocious

If you say it loud enough

You'll always sound precocious

Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious!

Um diddle diddle diddle um diddle ay

Um diddle diddle diddle um diddle ay

Because I was afraid to speak

When I was just a lad

My father gave me nose a tweak

And told me I was bad

But then one day I learned a word

That saved me aching nose

The biggest word I ever heard

And this is how it goes:

Oh, supercalifragilisticexpialidocious!

Even though the sound of it

Is something quite atrocious

If you say it loud enough

You'll always sound precocious

Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious!

Um diddle diddle diddle um diddle ay

Um diddle diddle diddle um diddle ay

So when the cat has got your tongue

There's no need for dismay

Just summon up this word

And then you've got a lot to say

But better use it carefully

Or it may change your life...

For example....

One night I said it to me girl

And now me girl's my wife!

She's supercalifragilisticexpialidocious!

Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious

Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious

Supercalifragilisticexpialidocious!

I sometimes drive my family crazy with that!

Actually it is the song the Voluntears Cavalcade sings in their parade. "The Time of your Life!" It's so upbeat and catchy and I always think about it since we got back from our trip on July 6th! I also think alot of the song from the Finding Nemo show-"It's a Big Blue World"!

At the moment, I have Gonna Take You There from the Princess and the Frog stuck in my head. This may last a while XD

We’re gonna take ya dere, we’re gonna take ya dere

We’re gonna take ya all de way dere

We gonna take ya dere, we gonna take ya dere

Gonna take ya all de way

Goin’ down de bayou

Goin’ down de bayou

Goin’ down de bayou

Takin’ ya all de way

We got de whole fam’ly! There goes Mimi, Cousin Budreau—oh, Grandmama! Your light out!

We all gonna pull togedda

Down here dat’s how we do

Dere for dem, dey’re dere for me

We all be dere for you

We gonna take ya

We gonna take ya

We gonna take ya all de way dere

We know where you’re goin’ and we’re goin wit’ you

Takin’ you all de way

Goin’ down de bayou

Goin’ down de bayou

Goin’ down de bayou

Takin’ you all… yeah, you know!

Come on, ya’ll! Keep dat life flowin’ and dose lights a-glowin’! Yeah, you right! I think we getting’ close! I hope somebody knows we’re we’re goin, ‘cause I’m lost, me!

Please excuse my horrific attempt at typing out a Cajun accent. I didn't mean to offend anybody, I just can't write phonetically ^.^;;

The king and his men

stole the queen from her bed

and bound her in her bones.

The seas be ours

and by the powers

...where we will we'll roam.

Yo, ho, all hands.

Hoist the colors high.

Heave, ho, thieves and beggars,

never shall we die.

Yo, Ho.

Haul, together.

Hoist the colors high.

Heave, ho, thieves and beggars,

never shall we die

Some have died

and some are alive

others sail on the sea

 with the keys to the cage...

and the Devil to pay

we lay to Fiddler's Green!

Yo, ho, haul together.

Hoist the colours high.

Heave ho, thieves and beggars,

never shall we die.

The bell has been raised

from its watery grave...

Hear its sepulchral tone.

A call to all,

pay heed the squall

and turn your sail to home!

Yo, ho, haul together.

Hoist the colors high.

Heave ho, thieves and beggars,

never shall we die.

Am I the only one who gets movie songs stuck in her head more often than park songs? Man, this really makes me feel that WDW withdrawl XD

At the moment, its Mad Madame Mim from the Sword in the Stone

With only a touch

I have the power

Zim zaba rim bim!

To wither a flower

I find delight in the gruesome and grim

'Cause I'm the magnificent, marvelous, mad Madame Mim

I can be huge

Fill the whole house

I can be teeny

Small as a mouse

Black sorcery is my dish of tea

It comes easy to me

'Cause I'm the magnificent, marvelous, mad Madame Mim!

*psychotic laughing*

I can be beautiful, lovely and fair

Silvery voice, long purple hair

La la la la la

La la la la la

La la la la la

But it's only skin deep

For zim zaberim ZIIIIM!

I'm an ugly old creep!

The magnificent, marvelous, mad, mad, mad, MAD Madame Mim!

On this magic night

A million stars will play beside us

Cast a spell of light

Shimmering, glimmering, carousel-ing!

'Round the world tonight,

A symphony in SpectroMagic.

Pure enchantment lights our way!

Music surrounds us

Laughter that found us

Twirling around this

Carousel of light and laughter!

We shall remember

This moment together

Let this night forever

Live in our dreams!

This gave me chills Love that song!!

Star light, star bright, first star I see tonight,

I wish I may, I wish I might have the wish I wish tonight

We'll make a wish and do as dreamers dooooo

and all our wishes will come true

Well I was just reading the People Mover post in the other forum...and thinking of the WEDWAY PeopleMover. That got me to singing this.....anyone remember it?? (My Dad was an Eastern pilot in those days)

If you had wings!

If you had wings!

If you had wings..had wings..had wings....

Oh, I remember it. A great attraction from the early days - because it didn't require a ticket. And from that same era:

Now is the time.

Now is the best time.

Now is the best time of your life.

Life is a prize, live every minute.

Open your eyes and watch how you win it.

Yesterday's memories may sparkle and gleam,

tomorrow is still but a dream.

Right here and now,

you've got it made.

The world's forward marching and you're in the parade!

Now is the time.

Now is the best time.

Be it a time of joy or strife.

There's so much to cheer for, be glad you're here.

For it's the best time of your life.
